name: Demon Of Wrath
flavor: A hulking demon with boulder-sized fists, driven by endless rage.

features.name: Anger Unrelenting - Passive
features.desc: The Demonâ€™s attacks deal direct damage.

features.name: Battle Lust - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to boil the blood of all PCs within Far range. They use a d20 as their Fear Die until the end of the scene.

features.name: Retaliation - Reaction
features.desc: When the Demon takes damage from an attack within Close range, you can mark a Stress to make a standard attack against the attacker.

features.name: Blood and Souls - Reaction Countdown (Loop 6):
features.desc: Activate the first time an attack is made within sight of the Demon. It ticks down when a PC takes a violent action. When it triggers, summon 1d4 Minor Demons, who appear at Close range.
